This kind of toy is super suitable for your children to learn catch and throw. Relieve stress and anxiety by simply playing with these fidgeting devices. Helps release and soothe stress. Boredom or to simply pass the time. You can let your children play it with other kids.

Classic Catch Ball Set: Come with 6pcs paddles, 3pcs Sticky Nylon Catch Balls. Sufficient quantity is great for you to share with friends and family to play with beach games catch ball
Softer Catch Ball: Diameter – 2.55 inch / 6.5 cm, weight – 0.13 lb / 57.9 gram. More suitable for kids, much stronger and softer with comfortable elasticity, no hand pain anymore
Upgraded and Durable Toss Paddles: Diameter – 7.28 inch / 18.5 cm, weight – 0.16 lb / 72.8 gram. Water resistant, reinforced nylon sticky cloth and strengthen the stitching part, much stronger and not break easily
How to Play Catch Ball Set: Two players keep a proper distance, one throws the ball and the other one catches it with the paddle. Our paddles can catch balls sticky. Each paddle attaches with a stitched adjustable strap, easy to play for most people
Ideal Kids Outdoor Toys: Catch ball set improve children’s eye-hand coordination ability and motor skills. Promote interaction among players. Enjoy the fun with our toss catch ball game set wherever you are. Best choice for the kids, family and friends

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $23.99 - $15.66
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:16:04 UTC – Details)


The Ultimate Catch Phrase game unit is designed so that players can toss it instead of passing it — putting the “catch” back into Catch Phrase! Players try to get teammates to guess the word or phrase that appears on the screen by describing it in just about any possible way — but they have to do it fast as the timer counts down! If a teammate can’t guess the word within 15 seconds, the unit will beep and it’s time to toss it to another team member who’ll get a chance at a new word. Don’t get caught holding the unit when the buzzer goes off or your team loses the round and the other team gets the point. The Ultimate Catch Phrase electronic party game features 5,000 words never seen in previous Catch Phrase games. Categories include: Around the World, Fun and Games, On the Air, Snack Time, and The Great Outdoors.

Hasbro Gaming and all related trademarks and logos are trademarks of Hasbro, Inc.
EXCITING GAMEPLAY: The Ultimate Catch Phrase game unit is designed for tossing and quick-on-your-feet active gameplay. Game for kids ages 12 and up
BUILT IN TIMER: If no one on a team has guessed a word or phrase after 15 seconds, the unit will beep. That signals that it’s time for help. Toss the unit to another teammate who’ll get a new word or phrase
DON’T GET CAUGHT: Don’t get caught holding the game unit. The team holding it when the 90-second timer goes off loses the round and the opposing team gets a point
SIX CATEGORIES: This Catch Phrase word game includes 5,000 words or phrases not seen in other Catch Phrase games
FUN ELECTRONIC PARTY GAME: Grab some friends and have an instant party with the Ultimate Catch Phrase game. It’s a fun, fast, active, and hilarious game for ages 12 and up

Read more

Product Description

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

Cool Game Sets for Outdoor Activities： While enjoying the fresh air, playing the ball catch game in backyard, park or on the lawn will be a very pleasant experience. Top Gift Idea: It will be a perfect idea to give away the toss and catch ball game set as a gift for Easter and birthday.More Interaction: To play the sport games at least 2 persons are required. So it will be a good chance for socialization and interaction among friends.Family Pack: 4 Pop-launcher Baskets and 6 balls, your whole family members can join the family games. You will enjoy the toss and catch ball game and love sports more than ever.

Mission and Vision of Duckura

Duckura are committed to the production and sales of toys for many years, and have been adhering to the provision of better quality, more creative, educational toys, and better service. Make kids learning in playing. Encourage parent and kids play outdoor and become friends.

Great sports and super fun!

Do you love sports and anything that involves throwing and grabbing a ball? Are your kids crazy about ball catching games?

If the answer to those questions is yes, then you should try these sport toys. We have designed the ball catching game that will offer you endless hours of ball throwing and catching.

PACKING LIST

Pop-launcher Baskets x 4 (2 Blue & 2 Green) Balls x 6 (3 Green + 3 Red) Colorful Storage Box x 1

High Premium and Safe Material

The launcher baskets and balls are made from high-quality ABS plastic. You will never worry about your kids getting hurt.

Educational Sports for Kids

This catch ball set will help your kids develop fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, problem-solving, spatial and communication skills!

Activities for Indoor & Outdoor

Our catch ball games can be played both indoor and outdoor.Very easy to take apart and assemble, convenient for taking to vacations, picnics, tailgating, camping, birthday parties and more!

Carnival Toss Games

Great Toy Set for Kids

【TOSS N’ CATCH GAMES】Are you boring during the holidays with family? This toss and catch ball sets are suit for you. Whatever backyard, lawn, camping, beach, pool or indoor, you can play with them anywhere you want.
【EASY To PLAY】Hold the ball holder basket in your hands, press the trigger to launch the ball and another one use basket to catch it. Let’s start the throwing and catching ball races with friends.
【ADULTS & KIDS ACTIVE】These sports games are good ideal for both kids and adults, whatever different skill levels. Suitable to indoor or outdoor activities with family.
【DEVELOP FINE MOTOR SKILLS】Besides being fun, this sport toys can help your kids collaborate and interact with other kids more easily. Help them develop fine motor skills and increase social skills.
【PACKAGE INCLUDE】Package will Comes with 4 launchers(2-blue and 2-green), 6 ping-pong balls(2 color random) and Exquisite Color box.(Great for Gifts).

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

Read more

With Nerf sports toys, you can play your favorite games with your own rules! The Nerf brand makes it fun and easy for everyone to play together, with foam balls that are easy to hold, throw, and catch. The Nerf Sports Pro Grip football is a classic foam ball that has an easy-grip design and is made of semi-soft foam, so you can play with it anyplace, inside or outside. Practice throwing spirals with the Nerf Pro Grip ball, and launch into a game almost anywhere, anytime! Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
DURABLE DESIGN FOR OUTDOOR AND INDOOR PLAY: This durable foam ball is made for outdoor and indoor play, so kids can get up and get active inside or outside
FUN TO CATCH, FUN TO THROW
Designed and sized so that everyone can have lots of fun practicing catches and throwing spiral passes
